this_title: My Little Pony Equestria Girls Minis
introduction: Coinciding with the release of the doll line, Hasbro is releasing Mini series of digital shorts for My Little Pony Equestria Girls Minis. The shorts have been released through multiple outlets online, including Hasbro's My Little Pony: Equestria Girls Official YouTube channel, Hasbro's My Little Pony Facebook page, Hasbro's My Little Pony Official YouTube channel, a My Little Pony: Equestria Girls Polska YouTube channel, the Smyths Toys Superstores YouTube channel, the @mylittlepony Instagram account, and Hasbro's own YouTube channel. These shorts have very minimal dialogue, with no involvement from the regular MLP voice actors.
foreign_title: My Little Pony Equestria Girls Minis
